Title: The Deadly Bees
Writer: Robert Bloch (screenplay), Anthony Marriott (screenplay by), Gerald Heard (novel)
Actors: Suzanna Leigh, Frank Finlay, Guy Doleman, Catherine Finn
Plot: Pop singer Vicki Robbins collapses from exhaustion while shooting the 1960s equivalent of a music video, and her physician prescribes a respite on Seagull Island with colleague and beekeeper Ralph Hargrove. Vicki finds the Hargroves' bitter marital strife oddly relaxing. But when a mysterious swarm of specially-bred attack bees starts killing island residents, Vicki fights for her survival, setting fire to nearly half the structures on the island in her escape.
